Our Mission

Our mission is to lead the change in the for-profit certificate market so that the majority of certificate students will begin their career with zero federal financial aid and minimal debt.

What We Do

By partnering with practicing offices, we set up and run career schools with a hands-on and innovative approach to save student loan debt.

Our Values

At Vandelay Education, we embody our core values daily and love giving back to our communities.

Create Wow

Passion for delivering exceptional service.

Hunger for Growth

Mediocrity is not an option! We constantly improve individually and as a team.

Practice Humility

We accept responsibility and share recognition.

Ownership Mentality

We own our responsibilities and outcomes.
